item.name: Option_R+Left,Right to Control+Left,Right
item.appendix: (You can switch Desktop by right option+arrows.)

item.name: Holding "E" Key to Mission Control (Expose)
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::E, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::EXPOSE_ALL, Option::NOREPEAT,

item.name: Holding "D" Key to Dashboard
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::D, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::DASHBOARD, Option::NOREPEAT,

item.name: Holding Shift+"E" Key to Mission Control (Expose)
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::E, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::E, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::EXPOSE_ALL, Option::NOREPEAT,

item.name: Holding Shift+"D" Key to Dashboard
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::D, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::D, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::DASHBOARD, Option::NOREPEAT,

item.name: Scroll (Left/Right) to Move a space (natural direction)
What's Expose Mode?
item.appendix: This makes it easy to use Expose.
You can do Expose by an alphabet key instead of F3 key.
- F to Move focus to active or next window (Control+F4)

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses [K+L] to toggle Expose Mode
[Option] Change "F" key behavior to "Option+Tab"
item.appendix: (Changing the shortcut of "Move focus" to "Option+Tab" from "Control+F4" is
a well workaround for a problem that Emacs.app grabs Control+F4 from system.)

item.name: What's Cmd+Tab Mode?
item.appendix: This makes it easy to use Command+Tab.

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses [Tab+Q] to toggle Cmd+Tab
Cmd+Space to enter Cmd+Tab Mode
item.modifier_not: ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R, ModifierFlag::FN, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R,

item.name: Cmd+Space to enter Cmd+Tab Mode
item.appendix: (+ Change the space key to the left control key.)
(+ Send a space key event when you pressed the space key alone.)

block.modifier_not: ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R, ModifierFlag::FN, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R,

item.name: Holding "S" Key to Spaces (F8)
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::S, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::F8, Option::NOREPEAT,

item.name: Holding Shift+"S" Key to Spaces (F8)
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::S, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::S, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_SHIFT, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::F8, Option::NOREPEAT,

item.name: Holding "1234 QWER ASDF ZXCV" to switch a space (4x4)

item.name: Use Command_R+[ASD FGH JKL] for Spaces
Use Command_R+[123 QWE ASD] for Spaces (3x3)
Use Command_R+[123 QWE ASD] for Spaces (4x4)
Use Command_R+[QWE ASD ZXC] for Spaces (3x3)
Use Command_R+[QWE ASD ZXC] for Spaces (3x3)
Use FN+[WER SDF XCV] for Spaces (3x3)
Use Fn+[1234 QWER ASDF ZXCV] for Spaces (4x4)
Use Fn+[7890 UIOP JKL; M,./] for Spaces (4x4)
Use Option_R+[WER SDF XCV] for Spaces (3x3)
